name: Vennie Della Cioppa
bio: Vennie Della Cioppa currently teaches Computer Science at Timpanogos High School. Prior to teaching, she worked as a programmer for over 15 years, with 8 of those years in a supervisory role managing the Application Development department. Currently, she also serves as the Content Teacher Leader (CTL) of the Alpine School District's High School CS & IT, as well as an adjunct instructor at Utah Valley University in both Digital Media and Computer Science.
